entries.original: [EN] CSS
entries.translated: CSS

entries.original: [EN] By default, VS Code triggers property value completion after selecting a CSS property. Use this setting to disable this behavior.
entries.translated: By mặc định, VS Code kích hoạt thuộc tính giá trị hoàn thành after selecting a CSS thuộc tính. Use this cài đặt đến disable this behavior.

entries.original: [EN] Insert semicolon at end of line when completing CSS properties.
entries.translated: Insert semicolon tại end of line khi completing CSS properties.

entries.original: [EN] Invalid number of parameters.
entries.translated: Inhợp lệ số lượng tham sốs.

entries.original: [EN] Do not use `width` or `height` when using `padding` or `border`.
entries.translated: Do not use `width` hoặc `height` khi using `padding` hoặc `border`.

entries.original: [EN] When using a vendor-specific prefix make sure to also include all other vendor-specific properties.
entries.translated: When using a vendor-specific prefix make sure đến also include all other vendor-specific properties.

entries.original: [EN] Do not use duplicate style definitions.
entries.translated: Do not use duplicate style definitions.

entries.original: [EN] Do not use empty rulesets.
entries.translated: Do not use empty rulesets.

entries.original: [EN] Avoid using `float`. Floats lead to fragile CSS that is easy to break if one aspect of the layout changes.
entries.translated: Avoid using `float`. Floats lead đến fragile CSS that is easy đến break nếu one aspect of the layout changes.

entries.original: [EN] `@font-face` rule must define `src` and `font-family` properties.
entries.translated: `@font-face` rule must define `src` và `font-family` properties.

entries.original: [EN] Hex colors must consist of 3, 4, 6 or 8 hex numbers.
entries.translated: Hex colors must consist of 3, 4, 6 hoặc 8 hex numbers.

entries.original: [EN] Selectors should not contain IDs because these rules are too tightly coupled with the HTML.
entries.translated: Selectors should not contain IDs because these rules are too tightly coupled với the HTML.

entries.original: [EN] IE hacks are only necessary when supporting IE7 and older.
entries.translated: IE hacks are only necessary khi supporting IE7 và older.

entries.original: [EN] Avoid using `!important`. It is an indication that the specificity of the entire CSS has gotten out of control and needs to be refactored.
entries.translated: Avoid using `!important`. It is an indication that the specificity of the entire CSS has gotten out of control và needs đến be refactored.

entries.original: [EN] Import statements do not load in parallel.
entries.translated: Import statements do not load trong parallel.

entries.translated: thuộc tính is ignored due đến the display. E.g. với `display: inline`, the `width`, `height`, `margin-top`, `margin-bottom`, và `float` properties have no effect.

entries.translated: A list of properties that are not hợp lệated against the `không xác địnhProperties` rule.

entries.translated: không xác định vendor specific thuộc tính.

entries.translated: When using a vendor-specific prefix, also include the standard thuộc tính.

entries.original: [EN] No unit for zero needed.
entries.translated: No unit cho zero needed.

entries.translated: Traces the communication between VS Code và the CSS language server.

entries.translated: điều khiển CSS kiểm tra tính hợp lệ và problem severities.

entries.translated: Show thuộc tính và giá trị documentation trong CSS đỗ chuộts.

entries.translated: Show references đến MDN trong CSS đỗ chuộts.

entries.translated: Enable/disable mặc định CSS formatter.

entries.original: [EN] Separate selectors with a new line.
entries.translated: Separate selectors với a new line.

entries.original: [EN] The minimum score (from 0 to 1) that fuzzy-matched abbreviation should achieve. Lower values may produce many false-positive matches, higher values may reduce possible matches.
entries.translated: The tối thiểu score (from 0 đến 1) that fuzzy-matched abbreviation should achieve. Lower giá trịs may produce many false-positive matches, higher giá trịs may reduce possible matches.

entries.original: [EN] The number of sibling inline elements needed for line breaks to be placed between those elements. If `0`, inline elements are always expanded onto a single line.
entries.translated: The số lượng sibling inline elements needed cho line breaks đến be placed between those elements. nếu `0`, inline elements are always expanded onto a single line.

entries.original: [EN] If `true`, reverses attribute merging directions when resolving snippets.
entries.translated: If `true`, reverses attribute merging directions khi resolving snippets.

entries.original: [EN] If `true`, color values like `#f` will be expanded to `#fff` instead of `#ffffff`.
entries.translated: If `true`, color giá trịs like `#f` will be expanded đến `#fff` instead of `#ffffff`.

entries.original: [EN] Configures when repositories should be automatically detected.
entries.translated: cấu hình khi repositories should be tự độngally detected.

entries.original: [EN] Scan for both subfolders of the current opened folder and parent folders of open files.
entries.translated: Scan cho both subfolders of the current opened folder và parent folders of open files.

entries.original: [EN] Disable automatic repository scanning.
entries.translated: Disable tự động repository scanning.

entries.original: [EN] Scan for subfolders of the currently opened folder.
entries.translated: Scan cho subfolders of the currently opened folder.

entries.original: [EN] Scan for parent folders of open files.
entries.translated: Scan cho parent folders of open files.

entries.original: [EN] Whether auto refreshing is enabled.
entries.translated: Whether auto refreshing is đã bật.

entries.original: [EN] When set to true, commits will automatically be fetched from the default remote of the current Git repository. Setting to `all` will fetch from all remotes.
entries.translated: When set đến true, commits will tự độngally be fetched từ the mặc định remote of the current Git repository. cài đặt đến `all` will fetch từ all remotes.

entries.original: [EN] Duration in seconds between each automatic git fetch, when `#git.autofetch#` is enabled.
entries.translated: Duration trong seconds between each tự động git fetch, khi `#git.autofetch#` is đã bật.

entries.original: [EN] Confirm before synchronizing Git repositories.
entries.translated: Confirm before synchronizing Git repositories.

entries.original: [EN] Controls the Git count badge.
entries.translated: điều khiển the Git count badge.

entries.original: [EN] Count all changes.
entries.translated: Count all changes.

entries.original: [EN] Count only tracked changes.
entries.translated: Count only tracked changes.

entries.original: [EN] Turn off counter.
entries.translated: Turn off counter.

entries.original: [EN] Controls what type of Git refs are listed when running `Checkout to...`.
entries.translated: điều khiển what type of Git refs are listed khi running `Checkout to...`.

entries.translated: Prefix used khi creating a new branch.

entries.translated: điều khiển whether a nhắc nhở is being shown before changes are committed đến a protected branch.

entries.original: [EN] Always commit changes to the protected branch.
entries.translated: Always commit changes đến the protected branch.

entries.original: [EN] Always commit changes to a new branch.
entries.translated: Always commit changes đến a new branch.

entries.original: [EN] Always prompt before changes are committed to a protected branch.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether a random name is generated when creating a new branch.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether a random name is generated khi creating a new branch.

entries.original: [EN] A regular expression to validate new branch names.
entries.translated: A regular expression đến hợp lệate new branch names.

entries.original: [EN] The character to replace whitespace in new branch names, and to separate segments of a randomly generated branch name.
entries.translated: The character đến replace whitespace trong new branch names, và đến separate segments of a randomly generated branch name.

entries.original: [EN] Ignores the legacy Git warning.
entries.translated: Ignores the legacy Git cảnh báo.

entries.original: [EN] Ignores the warning when Git is missing.
entries.translated: Ignores the cảnh báo khi Git is missing.

entries.original: [EN] Ignores the warning when Git 2.25 - 2.26 is installed on Windows.
entries.translated: Ignores the cảnh báo khi Git 2.25 - 2.26 is installed trên Windows.

entries.original: [EN] Ignores the warning when there are too many changes in a repository.
entries.translated: Ignores the cảnh báo khi there are too many changes trong a repository.

entries.original: [EN] Ignores the warning when it looks like the branch might have been rebased when pulling.
entries.translated: Ignores the cảnh báo khi it looks like the branch might have been rebased khi pulling.

entries.original: [EN] The default location to clone a Git repository.
entries.translated: The mặc định location đến clone a Git repository.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether a full text editor will be used to author commit messages, whenever no message is provided in the commit input box.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether a full text editor will be used đến author commit thông điệps, whenever no thông điệp is provided trong the commit input box.

entries.original: [EN] Enable verbose output when `#git.useEditorAsCommitInput#` is enabled.
entries.translated: Enable verbose output khi `#git.useEditorAsCommitInput#` is đã bật.

entries.original: [EN] Commit all changes when there are no staged changes.
entries.translated: Commit all changes khi there are no staged changes.

entries.original: [EN] Control which changes are automatically staged by Smart Commit.
entries.translated: Control which changes are tự độngally staged bởi Smart Commit.

entries.original: [EN] Automatically stage all changes.
entries.translated: tự độngally stage all changes.

entries.original: [EN] Automatically stage tracked changes only.
entries.translated: tự độngally stage tracked changes only.

entries.original: [EN] Suggests to enable smart commit (commit all changes when there are no staged changes).
entries.translated: Suggests đến enable smart commit (commit all changes khi there are no staged changes).

entries.original: [EN] Enables commit signing with GPG, X.509, or SSH.
entries.translated: cho phép commit signing với GPG, X.509, hoặc SSH.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether Git contributes colors and badges to the Explorer and the Open Editors view.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether Git contributes colors và badges đến the Explorer và the Open Editors view.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether the Git Sync command appears in the status bar.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether the Git Sync lệnh appears trong the thanh trạng thái.

entries.original: [EN] Push all annotated tags when running the sync command.
entries.translated: Push all annotated tags khi running the sync lệnh.

entries.original: [EN] Automatically replace the local tags with the remote tags in case of a conflict when running the pull command.
entries.translated: tự độngally replace the local tags với the remote tags trong case of a conflict khi running the pull lệnh.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether Git should check for unsaved files before stashing changes.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether Git should check cho unsaved files before stashing changes.

entries.original: [EN] Check for any unsaved files.
entries.translated: Check cho any unsaved files.

entries.original: [EN] Check only for unsaved staged files.
entries.translated: Check only cho unsaved staged files.

entries.original: [EN] Disable this check.
entries.translated: Disable this check.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether Git should check for unsaved files before committing.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether Git should check cho unsaved files before committing.

entries.original: [EN] Check for any unsaved files.
entries.translated: Check cho any unsaved files.

entries.original: [EN] Check only for unsaved staged files.
entries.translated: Check only cho unsaved staged files.

entries.original: [EN] Disable this check.
entries.translated: Disable this check.

entries.original: [EN] Run a git command after a successful commit.
entries.translated: Run a git lệnh after a successful commit.

entries.original: [EN] Don't run any command after a commit.
entries.translated: Don't run any lệnh after a commit.

entries.original: [EN] Run 'git push' after a successful commit.
entries.translated: Run 'git push' after a successful commit.

entries.original: [EN] Run 'git pull' and 'git push' after a successful commit.
entries.translated: Run 'git pull' và 'git push' after a successful commit.

entries.original: [EN] Remember the last git command that ran after a commit.
entries.translated: Remember the last git lệnh that ran after a commit.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether to open a repository automatically after cloning.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether đến open a repository tự độngally after cloning.

entries.original: [EN] Always open in current window.
entries.translated: Always open trong current window.

entries.original: [EN] Always open in a new window.
entries.translated: Always open trong a new window.

entries.original: [EN] Only open in current window when no folder is opened.
entries.translated: Only open trong current window khi no folder is opened.

entries.original: [EN] Always prompt for action.
entries.translated: Always nhắc nhở cho action.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether to show an inline Open File action in the Git changes view.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether đến show an inline Open file action trong the Git changes view.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether to show a notification when a push is successful.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether đến show a thông báo khi a push is successful.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether to show commit message input validation diagnostics.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether đến show commit thông điệp input kiểm tra tính hợp lệ diagnostics.

entries.original: [EN] Controls the commit message length threshold for showing a warning.
entries.translated: điều khiển the commit thông điệp length threshold cho showing a cảnh báo.

entries.original: [EN] Controls the commit message subject length threshold for showing a warning. Unset it to inherit the value of `#git.inputValidationLength#`.
entries.translated: điều khiển the commit thông điệp subject length threshold cho showing a cảnh báo. Unset it đến inherit the giá trị of `#git.inputkiểm tra tính hợp lệLength#`.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether to automatically detect Git submodules.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether đến tự độngally detect Git submodules.

entries.original: [EN] Controls the limit of Git submodules detected.
entries.translated: điều khiển the limit of Git submodules detected.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether to automatically detect Git worktrees.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether đến tự độngally detect Git worktrees.

entries.original: [EN] Controls the limit of Git worktrees detected.
entries.translated: điều khiển the limit of Git worktrees detected.

entries.original: [EN] Always show the Staged Changes resource group.
entries.translated: Always show the Staged Changes resource group.

entries.original: [EN] Controls the signoff flag for all commits.
entries.translated: điều khiển the signoff flag cho all commits.

entries.original: [EN] Ignore modifications to submodules in the file tree.
entries.translated: Ignore modifications đến submodules trong the file tree.

entries.original: [EN] List of Git repositories to ignore.
entries.translated: List of Git repositories đến ignore.

entries.original: [EN] List of paths to search for Git repositories in.
entries.translated: List of đường dẫns đến search cho Git repositories in.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether Git actions should show progress.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether Git actions should show progress.

entries.original: [EN] Force Git to use rebase when running the sync command.
entries.translated: Force Git đến use rebase khi running the sync lệnh.

entries.original: [EN] Always confirm the creation of empty commits for the 'Git: Commit Empty' command.
entries.translated: Always confirm the creation of empty commits cho the 'Git: Commit Empty' lệnh.

entries.original: [EN] When enabled, fetch all branches when pulling. Otherwise, fetch just the current one.
entries.translated: When đã bật, fetch all branches khi pulling. Otherwise, fetch just the current one.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether a branch that does not have outgoing commits is fast-forwarded before it is checked out.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether a branch that does not have outgoing commits is fast-forwarded before it is checked out.

entries.original: [EN] Fetch all tags when pulling.
entries.translated: Fetch all tags khi pulling.

entries.original: [EN] Prune when fetching.
entries.translated: Prune khi fetching.

entries.original: [EN] Stash any changes before pulling and restore them after successful pull.
entries.translated: Stash any changes before pulling và restore them after successful pull.

entries.original: [EN] Controls whether force push (with or without lease) is enabled.
entries.translated: điều khiển whether force push (with hoặc without lease) is đã bật.

entries.original: [EN] Use VS Code's file watchers instead of TypeScript's. Requires using TypeScript 5.4+ in the workspace.

entries.original: [EN] Strategy for how individual files are watched.

entries.original: [EN] Polls files in chunks at regular interval.
entries.translated: Polls files trong chunks tại regular interval.

entries.original: [EN] Check every file for changes several times a second at a fixed interval.
entries.translated: Check every file cho changes several times a second tại a fixed interval.

entries.translated: Check every file cho changes several times a second, but use heuristics đến check certain types of files less frequently than others.

entries.original: [EN] Use a dynamic queue where less-frequently modified files will be checked less often.

entries.translated: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`, và `organizeImports.caseSensitivity` is not `caseInsensitive`. Indicates whether upper-case will sort before lower-case.

entries.translated: mặc định order given bởi `locale`.

entries.original: [EN] Lower-case comes before upper-case. E.g.` a, A, z, Z`.
entries.translated: Lower-case comes before upper-case. E.g.` a, A, z, Z`.

entries.original: [EN] Upper-case comes before lower-case. E.g. ` A, a, B, b`.
entries.translated: Upper-case comes before lower-case. E.g. ` A, a, B, b`.

entries.original: [EN] Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Sort numeric strings by integer value.
entries.translated: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Sort numeric strings bởi integer giá trị.

entries.original: [EN] Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Compare characters with diacritical marks as unequal to base character.
entries.translated: Requires `organizeImports.unicodeCollation: 'unicode'`. Compare characters với diacritical marks as unequal đến base character.
